page.title: 18APPLETON ROEBUCK CHURCHES
page.content: There are two church buildings:All Saints' C.E. and a Methodist Chapel. Both are in full use although they have small but growing congregations. Neither has a full time minister.At some Festivals there are quite large gatherings.The school uses All Saints for its well attended Carols and Harvest Festival service. On the whole church going is not a feature of village life for most residents and the church is not at the centre of village activities.Neither has a large hall,both use the school, Parish room or the Theatre at Nun Appletonfor large meetings. There is a joint Sunday school in the Methodist Chapel.There are Family Services,joint services nd each month there is a Parade service for the Cubs,Brownies,Scouts & Guides. All Saints has a growing choir.
